job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pMylo is a fastgrowing insurtech leader with an embeddable digital insurance platform that enables our partners to offer expert coverage advice and solutions to their clients Our proprietary technology  the Mind of Mylo  delivers precise coverage recommendations to business owners and individuals It matches risks with carrier appetites and determines the right insurance at the best value from multiple leading carriers for a wide variety of needs including business small group benefits home auto life individual health and MedicareppnbspppBacked by global investor Guggenheim Partners and the worlds largest independent broker Lockton and drawing on 55 years of Lockton insurance expertise Mylo offers expert insurance recommendations online or over the phone with licensed agents More information about Mylo can be found at wwwchoosemylocomppnbspppWe are revolutionizing insurance to protect what mattersppbrppstronguDescriptionustrongppDo you like to have your hands in a little bit of everything We are looking for versatile full stack developers that are comfortable with and excited by working on a variety of different kinds of projects In addition to our consumer facing web features we also support our marketing department and insurance agent sales team building tools and integrations to make them more effective and efficient If you enjoy solving various problems with code and technology we are the place for youppbrppAs part of a relatively small development team youll have ownership over technology and architectural decisions and be given high level business problems to solve with code Youll be able to see the direct impact of your work on our users internal and external and our ability to scale and grow our businessppbrppstrongOur Technology StackstrongppbrpulliNodejs microservicesliliReactjs Redux TypeScript MaterialUIliliAWS EC2 S3 EKS etcliliKafkaliliPostgresliliGithub Travis CI Docker HubliulpbrppstronguEssential Duties and metliliGiven the nature of the business insurance apply due diligence to security and HIPAA best practicesliliBe trustworthy have integrity and a strong work ethicliliExercise initiative in taking on tasks with minimal directionliliLearn new areas independently and without formal trainingliulpbrppstronguEducationExperienceustrongpulliAn understanding of Continuous Delivery principles and experience implementing themliliAn understanding of Agile principles and experience working in such an environmentliliAbility to apply a wide variety of open source technologies and toolsliliA
